film-popular.title: The Great Escape
film-popular.description: A gripping World War II adventure film about a group of Allied prisoners attempting to escape from a German POW camp.

film-popular.title: Inception
film-popular.description: A mind-bending science fiction film about stealing secrets from deep within the subconscious during the dream state.

film-popular.title: The Shawshank Redemption
film-popular.description: A powerful drama about hope and friendship in the confines of a prison.

film-popular.title: Pulp Fiction
film-popular.description: A nonlinear crime film that weaves together multiple storylines in the seedy underbelly of Los Angeles.

film-popular.title: The Godfather
film-popular.description: A classic Mafia film chronicling the rise of the Corleone crime family.
